lines.gurmukhi: jYsy coAw cMdnu Aau Dwn pwn bycn kau; pUrib idsw lY jwie kYsy bin AwvY jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as someone takes the products grown in the East like rice, betel, sandalwood to sell there, he cannot gain anything in their trading.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ Aqr cMnx Aqy Dwn DweIˆ qQw pwn jo pUrb dyS dIAwˆ aupj rUp cIjwˆ hn koeI pUrb idSw nUM vpwr Kwqr l`d ljwvy qwˆ ieh iks qrHwˆ bx Aw P`b skdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: pCm idsw dwK dwrm lY jwie jYsy; imRg md kysur lY auqrih DwvY jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as someone takes the products grown in the West like grapes and pomegranates, and those commodities grown in the North like saffron and musk to the West and North respectively, what gain does he get out of such trading?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ p`Cm idSw v`ly dwK AMgUr sogI Anwr lY jwvy jo ik p`Cm ivc hI aupjdy hn, Aru kysr ksqUrI au`qrw KMf kSmIr Awid dyS ivc ljwx leI dOVy[

lines.gurmukhi: dKn idsw lY jwie lwiecI lvMg lwid; bwid Awsw audm hY ibVqo n pwvY jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as someone takes commodities like cardamom and clove to South where these are grown, all his efforts of earning any profit would be futile.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ p`Cm idSw v`ly dwK AMgUr sogI Anwr lY jwvy jo ik p`Cm ivc hI aupjdy hn, Aru kysr ksqUrI au`qrw KMf kSmIr Awid dyS ivc ljwx leI dOVy[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gun iniD gur swgr kY ibidmwn; igAwn gun pRgit kY bwvro khwvY jI [511[

Unknown.translation: Similarly if someone tries to display his traits and knowledge before the True Guru who Himself is ocean of knowledge and divine traits, such a person will be called a fool.  (511)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsI pRkwr siqgurU jo guxwˆ dy BMfwr rUp swgr hn Enwˆ dy ibidAwmwn snmuK, igAwn Awid, guxwˆ nUM cqurweI mwn vjoˆ pRgt kr ky, bOrw sudweI hI khweIdw hY ]511]
